entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4 except 8 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High plus 4 except 8 north of Cape Ray. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
